SELECT a.id, a.store_name, a.store_img_path, a.store_column, b.column_name store_column_name, a.store_location, a.latitude, a.longitude, a.store_detail, a.store_discount, a.top_flag, a.state, a.create_time, a.store_price, a.view_count, a.store_stars, b.type, a.store_phone, (select count(1) from store_comment where store_id = a.id) comment_numbers, cast(acos( cos(cast(#{latitude} AS DECIMAL(20, 6)) * pi() / 180) * cos(cast(latitude AS DECIMAL(20, 6)) * pi() / 180) * cos( cast(#{longitude} AS DECIMAL(20, 6)) * pi() / 180 - CAST(a.longitude AS DECIMAL(20, 6)) * pi() / 180 ) + sin(cast(#{latitude} AS DECIMAL(20, 6)) * pi() / 180) * sin( CAST(a.latitude AS DECIMAL(20, 6)) * pi() / 180 ) ) * 6370996.81 / 1000 AS DECIMAL(20, 2)) as distance
FROM sys_store a left join sys_column b on a.store_column = b.id WHERE a.state = 'A'
and a.store_column = #{columnId}
order by a.top_flag asc,a.create_time desc
order by a.store_price desc,a.create_time desc
order by a.store_price asc,a.create_time desc
order by a.store_stars desc,a.create_time desc
